text: Pulp Fiction is a 1994 American crime drama movie set in Los Angeles. It was directed by Quentin Tarantino. The movie stars John Travolta, Bruce Willis, Uma Thurman and Samuel L. Jackson. It is a very popular movie. Pulp Fiction is rated R for strong graphic violence and drug use, profanity and some sexuality. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1994 crime drama movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:BAFTA Award winning movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Film noir Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies about murderers Category:Movies directed by Quentin Tarantino Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Rape in movies Category:American independent movies
title: Pulp Fiction
